metadata.title: Design and cloning of CRISPR sgRNA library

equipment.name: Agilent chip oligo array synthesis platform

samples.name: Designed sgRNA library (selection of up to five sgRNAs per gene plus 10% safe‑harbour controls)
Cloned lentiviral plasmid sgRNA library (constitutive sgRNA and mCherry expression)

annotations.description: Designed the interneuron migration CRISPR sgRNA library by selecting up to five sgRNAs targeting each of the 438 genes of interest (425 NDD genes and 13 interneuron development genes) and added an extra 10% ‘safe’ harbour‑targeting negative control sgRNAs.
Synthesized the sgRNA library oligos on the Agilent chip oligo array synthesis platform.
Cloned the synthesized oligos into a lentiviral plasmid vector that constitutively expresses the sgRNA and mCherry.
